data.title: ProMarket
data.description: Zorra is an e-commerce platform dedicated to delivering high-quality products with a seamless shopping experience. Built with user convenience in mind, Zorra offers a wide range of items, intuitive navigation, and secure checkout, empowering customers to shop confidently and efficiently.
data.stack: REACTJS, TAILWIND, TYPESCRIPT, NODEJS, FIREBASE, POSTGRESQL

data.title: Virall
data.description: Virall is a digital agency specializing in crafting innovative web solutions and digital strategies for businesses. From eye-catching website designs to tailored marketing campaigns, Virall helps brands establish a powerful online presence and achieve their digital goals with precision and creativity.

data.title: Spanish Hotel
data.description: Spanish Hotel is a full-featured hotel management platform built for ease of reservations, room management, and customer interaction. Users can view room types, make online bookings, and receive real-time updates. The backend supports automated room status tracking, admin tools, and dynamic pricing controls. Designed with responsiveness and accessibility in mind.
data.stack: NEXTJS, TAILWINDCSS, SHADCN UI, POSTGRESQL PRISMA, SUPABSE

skill.title: Frontend Development
skill.description: My approach to frontend development combines creativity with precision. Using HTML to structure content, I ensure semantic and accessible layouts that form the foundation of responsive web experiences. With CSS and Sass, I design sleek interfaces that are both visually engaging and performance-optimized. JavaScript allows me to introduce dynamic behavior and interactivity, bringing websites to life. I use React to build fast, component-based interfaces that scale efficiently and deliver a smooth user experience. For complex applications, I integrate frameworks like Next.js to enable server-side rendering and SEO-friendly architecture. I also harness reusable UI components and hooks to accelerate development and reduce code duplication. Each project I handle is designed mobile-first, ensuring seamless performance across all devices. Whether it’s building marketing sites or full-fledged web apps, I bring an eye for detail and a strong understanding of user needs to every frontend I build.

skill.title: Backend Development
skill.description: In backend development, I architect the logic that powers high-performance web applications. I use Node.js as the backbone of my server-side code, ensuring event-driven, scalable APIs. Express.js helps me manage routes, middleware, and error handling with clean, modular code structures. I handle data efficiently using MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or MySQL, depending on project needs, and apply ORMs like Prisma for clean data querying and schema migration. For authentication and user sessions, I implement secure JWT-based systems and Firebase when real-time sync or serverless backend is required. My backend workflow ensures robust error handling, high-level security, and clean documentation. I focus on RESTful design principles and can also implement GraphQL when needed. From processing form data to enabling AI-driven features or payment integrations, I make sure the backend is reliable, scalable, and easy to maintain. Every backend I build is designed to work in harmony with the frontend for a smooth user experience.

skill.title: Web & Graphic Design
skill.description: My approach to web and graphic design blends creativity with functionality. Using tools like Figma, Adobe XD, and Canva, I create intuitive interfaces that align with the brand’s identity while ensuring excellent user experience. I begin with wireframes and mood boards to explore ideas, then iterate on layouts, color palettes, and typography to bring concepts to life. For logos, social media posts, and brand visuals, I rely on Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop to craft sharp, high-resolution designs that capture attention. I understand the balance between aesthetic design and functional UX, making sure every design element serves a purpose. My designs are mobile-friendly, accessibility-conscious, and created with developers in mind—ensuring smooth handoffs for implementation. Whether I’m prototyping a landing page or creating brand assets, I focus on delivering cohesive, visually striking outputs that help businesses communicate clearly, build trust, and convert users effectively across all platforms.
